entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 10:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
